data.eml:eml: The ant genus Polyrhachis F. Smith in sub-Saharan Africa, with descriptions of ten new species. (Hymenoptera: Formicidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Rigato, Fabrizio (2016): The ant genus Polyrhachis F. Smith in sub-Saharan Africa, with descriptions of ten new species. (Hymenoptera: Formicidae). Zootaxa 4088 (1), DOI: 10.11646/zootaxa.4088.1.1
